actions.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Mr. McCloskey moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.
On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.
The title of the measure was amended. Agreed to without objection.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate, read twice.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Postal Operations and Services

official_title: To redesignate the Midland General Mail Facility in Midland, Texas, as the "Carl O. Hyde General Mail Facility".

summary.text: Redesignates the Midland General Mail Facility at 10000 Sloan Field Boulevard, Midland, Texas, as the Carl O. Hyde General Mail Facility. Amends the Federal Employee Pay Comparability Act of 1990 to prohibit an agency's consideration of nonemployee pay items (such as expenses, allowances, travel, and other necessary reimbursement items) when determining whether an employee's compensation exceeds the pay cap for executive level I positions.

titles.title: To redesignate the Midland General Mail Facility in Midland, Texas, as the "Carl O. Hyde General Mail Facility".
